name: Infinity Castle
description: The Infinity Castle is a pocket dimension consisting of lamplit wooden rooms, long halls, and moving corridors. It possesses a warped direction of gravity, allowing demons to stand upright, upside down, or perpendicularly on the walls, or move in physically impossible directions. Its unusual structure and layout as Nakime's Blood Demon Art allows any structure within to shift at her will, though the castle additionally also seems to move on its own.

name: Mount Sagiri
description: The mountain is used bySakonji Urokodakito train children working towards becoming aDemon Slayer. Sakonji tests his students by giving them the task of slicing a boulder using a katana. If they succeed, they are sent to participate in theFinal Selection. Children who complete the Final Selection are accepted as Demon Slayers. For those who die in the Final Selection, their spirits return to the mountain.

name: Ogimoto House
description: After he loses contact with his wife, Tengen travels to the Entertainment District with the Demon Slayer's to try to infiltrate a second time. When they are walking on the street, the madam of the Ogimoto household coincidentally bumps intoInosuke Hashibira(disguised as Inoko), and offers to take her in as a courtesan.

name: Ubuyashiki Mansion
description: Ubuyashiki MansionAnimeMangaNameJapanese産屋敷邸RōmajiUbuyashiki-teiCharacteristicsPositionOn top of a mountainStatusDestroyedAffiliationDemon Slayer CorpsDebutMangaChapter 45AnimeEpisode 22Ubuyashiki Mansion(産屋敷邸,Ubuyashiki-tei?)was a significant location inDemon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba. It was the place where theOyakata, leader of theDemon Slayer Corps, and his family resided. It also served as the headquarters for the Corps.

name: Mount Natagumo
description: The Spider Family attempts to live in peace on the mountain and whenever anyone approaches them, the family attack the intruders and kill them. The mountain is ruled byRui, Lower Rank 5 of theTwelve Kizuki, and also the head of the Spider Family. Rui makes sure that all of his family members are doing their tasks to keep the family safe.

name: Eternal Paradise Faith
description: The cult was located in a shrine with several lotus iconography, with Doma being surrounded by a bed of lotuses. However, Doma is also shown to have his own palace surrounded by a large water garden with endless pathways inside theInfinity Castle. Given that Doma's is shown dining on several female disciples on the pathways, it is possible that the location inside the secret demon fortress is where Doma's followers meet their demise. In addition, Doma was known to collect the decomposed heads...

name: Northwest Town
description: Northwest TownAnimeMangaNameJapanese北西の町RōmajiHokusei no machiCharacteristicsPositionNearMount SagiriDebutMangaChapter 10AnimeEpisode 6Northwest Town(北西の町,Hokusei no machi?)is a location in theKidnapper's Bog Arc. It is the location ofTanjiro Kamado's first mission after he officially became aDemon Slayerafter passing theFinal Selection.

name: Yoshiwara
description: For about a century, before the latest intervention of theDemon Slayer Corps, Yoshiwara became the home and the lair of two extremely powerful demons: the siblingsDakiandGyutaro, the dual holders of the position of Upper Rank Six of theTwelve Kizuki. Owing to Daki's great beauty, experience in sex work, and her unique Blood Demon Art, they made Yoshiwara a successful hunting ground, where they captured and devoured numerous victims over the years. Daki's nigh-immortality and subsequent attemp...

name: Mount Kumotori
description: After his mother died from illness when he was ten years old,Yoriichi Tsugikunifled from his home. He ran straight for one day and one night without any sign of exhaustion. Eventually, he arrived at a place full of compact fields and paddies on Mount Kumotori. There, he metUta, a girl of similar age who had tragically lost her entire family to a a widespread illness. Yoriichi made the decision to reside with Uta in her humble mountain hut, and over the course of ten years, their bond deepened...
role: Boundary of Tokyo, Saitama, and Yamanashi Prefectures

attributes.Position: Boundary of Tokyo, Saitama, and Yamanashi Prefectures

name: Swordsmith Village
description: To safeguard the village fromDemonattacks, strict measures are taken to keep the place concealed and its exact location is kept confidential. Demon Slayers who wish to visit the village must travel blindfolded, with their ears and noses plugged, while piggybacking aKakushi, to prevent information from being leaked to the demons. After some time, the travelers are passed from one Kakushi to another. Furthermore, the routes and Kakushi themselves are frequently changed. Even the Kakushi who tra...

name: Asakusa
description: It is a large, heavily populated urban center with tall buildings and bright lights that illuminate the city during the night.Many people walk through crowded marketplaces with dozens of business signs. UnlikeTanjiro's small town, there are cars of carriages guiding citizens through the roads. There is also a trolley system that runs throughout the city. The city sits on a bay decorated with a large fountain tower next to a large body of water.

name: Butterfly Mansion
description: AfterNezuko Kamadobecame the first demon to conquer the sun, she was relocated to the Butterfly Mansion for her protection withSakonji Urokodakias her caretaker. In additionKiriya,Kuina, andKanata Ubuyashikiwere stationed at the mansion to prepare and aid for theeventualbattleagainstMuzan Kibutsuji, and to keep tabs on the corps when they were forced inside the Infinity Castle usingKasugai CrowsandYushiro'sBlood Demon Art.Former-HashiraTengen UzuiandShinjuro Rengokuacted as bodyguards andSuma...

name: Tsuzumi Mansion
description: Tsuzumi MansionAnimeMangaNameJapanese鼓の屋敷RōmajiTsuzumi no YashikiCharacteristicsPositionSouth-southeastStatusAbandonedDebutMangaChapter 21AnimeEpisode 11TheTsuzumi Mansion(鼓の屋敷,Tsuzumi no Yashiki?)is a large house controlled byKyogailocated in the south-southeast.It is the titular setting of theTsuzumi Mansion Arc.

name: Mount Fujikasane
description: Mount FujikasaneAnimeMangaNameJapanese藤襲山RōmajiFujikasane YamaCharacteristicsAffiliationDemon Slayer CorpsDebutMangaChapter 6AnimeEpisode 4Mount Fujikasane(藤襲山,Fujikasane Yama?), is a mountain full ofWisteriablooming every season from the mountain's foot to its slope.

name: Kyogoku House
description: After he loses contact with his wife, Tengen travels to the Entertainment District with the Demon Slayers to try to infiltrate a second time. AfterTanjiroandInosukeare dropped off at their corresponding houses, Zenitsu is abandoned at the Kyogoku house by Tengen (disguised as Zenko).

name: Tokito House
description: After he loses contact with his wife, Tengen travels to the Entertainment District with the Demon Slayers to try to infiltrate a second time. Tengen presents the Demon Slayers, crudely dressed in makeup, to the Tokito house, hoping one of them will be taken in and begin the mission. Though the owners are shocked at their appearance, the house's madam happily agrees to take one in, taken aback by Tengen's handsomeness. Tanjiro (disguised as Sumiko) is taken. At first, the madam is furious that...

name: Mugen Train (locomotive)
description: Sometime after theLower Ranks Meeting, several passengers of the Mugen Train went missing, with the casualty count reaching at least 40. This suspicious pattern was not lost on theDemon Slayer Corps, who suspected that ademonwas behind the disappearances.FlameHashiraKyojuro Rengokuwas assigned to investigate the train, and with the recommendation ofInsectHashiraShinobu Kocho, Demon SlayersTanjiro Kamado,Zenitsu Agatsuma, andInosuke Hashibirawere also sent to accompany him. However, only Zenit...

name: Kirimise
description: After interrogating the master of theKyogoku Housefor her whereabouts,Tengen Uzuienters the Kirimise and is able to locate Hinatsuru, ill and still bound in obi. He cuts her free and gives her an antidote, whilst she explains why she was unable to contact him. Telling him to leave her and fight the demon, Hinatsuru is hugged by Tengen before he leaves for battle, leaving her to heal.
